comment._content: The Ghost Train still runs - spooky! - It was originally the Main Southern Railway. More history here - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hill_Top,_New_South_Wales And the Picton Loop Line - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Picton_Loop_railway_line,_New_South...
